IGraphLayoutScheme
public interface
IGraphLayoutScheme
DepthLayoutScheme

Represents a scheme for assigning a 2D position to each node in a graph.

Functions
Layout
void Layout(
DirectedGraph digraph,
Size layoutArea,
Span<Point> nodePosByIdx
)

Layout the nodes of the provided directed in a 2D area specified by layoutArea.

Parameters
digraph
DirectedGraph

The directed graph to be laid out.

layoutArea
Size

The area to layout nodes within.

nodePosByIdx
Span<Point>

A span that will be populated with a 2D position for each node, within the provided layout area.

Layout
void Layout(
DirectedGraph digraph,
Size layoutArea,
Span<Point> nodePosByIdx,
ref object? layoutSchemeData
)

Layout the nodes of the provided directed in a 2D area specified by layoutArea.

Parameters
digraph
DirectedGraph

The directed graph to be laid out.

layoutArea
Size

The area to layout nodes within.

nodePosByIdx
Span<Point>

A span that will be populated with a 2D position for each node, within the provided layout area.

layoutSchemeData
ref object?

An optional object that conveys layout data specific to the layout scheme.
